EmailTemplate.name: 201804_APAC_Event_HOC_Rotortech_mih.201804_APAC_Event_Confirmation_HOC_Rotortech
EmailTemplate.subject: Registration Confirmed: Honeywell Operators Conference in Rotortech - Novotel TwinWaters
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
Your registration has been confirmed for the Honeywell Operators Conference in conjunction with Rotortech 2018
Honeywell Helicopter Operators Conference, Asia Pacific Date: Wednesday, May 23, 2018 Time: 9:30 a.m. – 4:00 p.m.Location: Novotel Twin Waters Resort <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/Novotel%20Twin%20Waters%20Resort%20Map%202018.pdf]]> Lily’s on the Lagoon 270 Ocean Drive, Sunshine Coast, Queensland, Australia
Please contact us at Michael.Keat@Honeywell.com <[[mailto:Michael.Keat@Honeywell.com]]>with any questions.
We look forward to meeting you during our event.
Sincerely,
Honeywell Aerospace Event Team
